title: League of Legends Support takes too long
body: So I have sent them a ticket because i am having a problem getting the riot girl Tristana skin and the ticket has not been answered and it has been a full day already someone please help me T_T

replies.body: Usually Blitzbot can help with issues like this one, so I'm curious what's taking so long.  If you want to toss me your ticket ID, I'd be happy to take a look!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UQvLjErz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-07T20:51:29.681+0000)
>
> Usually Blitzbot can help with issues like this one, so I'm curious what's taking so long.  If you want to toss me your ticket ID, I'd be happy to take a look!

I made a ticket about 24 hours ago, do you mind checking mine? I can't log on one of my account's since all the maintenance issues happened, but i transferred my account from euw to na, so i think that mite have to do with it? All the infos correct, but the game just won't let me log onto site or ingame... pls help xddd 
been waiting 24+ hours..

That's strange!  What error message are you receiving when trying to login?  On the login screen, are you connected to the correct region that you transferred to?  What's the number?  Happy to help, just let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UQvLjErz,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T15:46:17.188+0000)
>
> That's strange!  What error message are you receiving when trying to login?  On the login screen, are you connected to the correct region that you transferred to?  What's the number?  Happy to help, just let me know!

Been over 30+ hours xddd 
TICKET #30558663
And idk, it registers that i can change the password fine, but when it comes to actually logging onto the account, even after i change passwords wether i try to log onto it on NA or EUW it just doesn't go through, guess it got lost in space when i tried to Xfer servers <___>
Pls help....

In a way, you're kind of right.  We're sending a space probe to get you back. :p  It may take a bit, but there is a specialist on your ticket and working towards pushing your transfer through.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UQvLjErz,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T21:14:46.532+0000)
>
> In a way, you're kind of right.  We're sending a space probe to get you back. :p  It may take a bit, but there is a specialist on your ticket and working towards pushing your transfer through.  Hang tight!

Thank you so much, account has such a super rare omega skin, would hate to lose it xdd
